wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Anthony George (14 August 1922 – October 1989) was an English professional footballer. He played for Crystal Palace and Colchester United between 1948 and 1955, making 127 appearances in the Football League.

response: *Ron George (footballer) (1922–1989), English professional footballer who played for Crystal Palace and Colchester United
